Holly

ot.com

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Nance Confer
Sent: Wednesday, November 21, 2007 1:43 PM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] NHEN



Hi Holly --
I heard back about the NHEN website.

The website guru, Teresa, is doing some behind-the-scenes work (all way
above my pay grade as far as understanding the technical side) and the site
is just down temporarily while she does that.

Keep checking back was the answer I took from it all. :)

Happy unschooling! :)

Nance

NHEN
Posted by: "Holly Simpson" HYPERLINK
"mailto:simpson.fam%40insightbb.com"simpson.fam@-insightbb.-com simpson5fam
Tue Nov 20, 2007 8:19 am (PST)
Does anyone know what's happened to NHEN? I've tried several times to
register and to add our local group to their site with no success. All
of the email contacts listed on their contact page get returned to me
as undeliverable.

Holly Simpson
